mapper.update: update hz_lab_report_log set course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lab_report_id = #{labReportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, back_time = #{backTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, restart_time = #{restartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, course_id, test_id, lab_report_id, student_id, class_id, back_time, apply_id, `type`, teacher_id, score, restart_time from hz_lab_report_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
